metadata.title: CVE-2016-10522 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: rails_admin ruby gem <v1.1.1 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery(CSRF) attacks. Non-GET methods were not validating CSRF tokens and, as aresult, an attacker could hypothetically gain access to the applicationadministrative endpoints exposed by the gem.

criterions.comment: ruby-rails-admin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
